exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. split. - intros H_series. unfold is_pseries, is_series in *. apply is_series_scal. + intros n. rewrite <- H_series. unfold scal, pow_n. reflexivity. + auto. - intros H_series. unfold is_pseries, is_series in *. unfold scal, pow_n in *. specialize (H_series 1%nat). rewrite Rmult_1_l in H_series. auto.
